title: Poem in Regular-Running Script
marks: Signature and Marks L center: [ ???? ] {Ry?wan r?jin}
description: three full lines and a fourth short line of very neatly, clearly written, evenly spaced characters, no cursive; red intaglio seal URC; two red seals (top intaglio; bottom relief) LLC; mounted onto thick paperboard with gold leaf flecks on border
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
